meta.title: Justin | Co-Founder & President, Pixel Palette Nation (PPN) & MyPalette
meta.description: Meet Justin, the curator-operator behind Pixel Palette Nation and MyPalette—building an artist-first platform that turns independent creators into globally visible talent.

hero.name: Justin
hero.title: Co-Founder & President, Pixel Palette Nation & MyPalette
hero.tagline: Your art. Your stage. Your success.

about.summary: Justin launched Pixel Palette Nation during the 2021 generative AI boom to unite independent digital artists, curators, and galleries across continents.

origin_story.headline: Forged in the generative AI surge.
origin_story.copy: When creative barriers dropped in 2021, Justin saw artists still isolated from opportunity. He built PPN as a community and MyPalette as the platform to showcase talent globally.

inflection_point.headline: From Discord rooms to world stages.
inflection_point.copy: PPN’s open calls now place artists in exhibitions from Colorado to Albania, proving that digital-native curation can unlock real-world recognition and careers.

mission.headline: Build the premier launchpad where independent creators turn art into sustainable careers.

pillars.title: Artist-First Infrastructure
pillars.description: Free submissions, portfolio tools, and curated showcases designed with—and for—artists.

pillars.title: Global Exposure
pillars.description: Bridge traditional galleries with digital-native talent to deliver exhibitions, clients, and revenue.

pillars.title: Community Momentum
pillars.description: Keep the 55,000-strong creative network growing through social audio, Discord, and collaborative events.

project.name: Pixel Palette Nation & MyPalette
project.problem: Independent artists face fragmented communities, scarce exposure, and platforms that charge for visibility without delivering results.
project.solution: PPN operates a curated community and the MyPalette platform to connect artists with galleries, brand clients, and global audiences—combining open calls, exhibitions, and career support under one roof.
value_proposition: Showcase work alongside 150+ active artists with zero submission fees for open calls.
Access real gallery partnerships, corporate commissions, and curated exhibitions worldwide.
Leverage social audio, Discord programming, and event partnerships to build audiences fast.

experience.headline: Artist journey inside MyPalette.
copy: Create a free portfolio in under a minute and tap into live open calls.
Receive curation feedback and mentorship from PPN community leads.
Land in exhibitions—from Ethereum Phoenix film showcases to international art festivals.

features: Open calls spanning galleries, brands, and festivals
Hybrid digital/physical exhibitions across the US and Europe
Partnerships with Stand With Crypto, AI Film 3, and BitAngels events
Community programming via Discord, Spaces, and pop-up showcases

traction.community_scale: 55,000+ creatives, collectors, and partners interconnected across Arizona, Colorado, and global chapters.
traction.platform_activity: 153 active artists, 69 live portfolios, and 8 active opportunities on MyPalette (and growing daily).

call_to_action.headline: Ready to turn your art into opportunity?

highlights: Curated artists like Nuria List from open calls to global exhibitions, including the Balkans showcase in Albania.
Helped community member Frisky Foxtrot secure paid marketing design work through PPN introductions.
Co-produces ETHPhoenix and AI Film 3 showcases with Shelton Beascochea, PJ Way, and the Stand With Crypto network.
Runs exhibitions across Colorado and Arizona, expanding to new markets with each festival season.
Operates MyPalette to unite traditional and digital art worlds with gallery partnerships and real prizes.

quotes.speaker: Justin
quotes.text: We started out of the boom of AI in 2021—when generative lowered the barrier, we knew artists needed a home.

quotes.speaker: Justin
quotes.text: Every piece of media you see—phones, movies, TV—has a digital artist behind it. Mixed media is the future.

quotes.speaker: Justin
quotes.text: Social audio and online networks made all of this possible—we wouldn’t be curating Arizona or Albania without them.

quotes.speaker: Justin
quotes.text: We’re building a platform that provides sustainable opportunities for artists to get recognized all around the world.

quotes.speaker: Justin
quotes.text: Make sure you join our Discord—there’s always something fun and valuable happening for creatives.

timeline.event: Founded Pixel Palette Nation during the generative AI surge to unify independent digital artists.
Expanded curation from online Spaces to physical showcases across Colorado.
Launched MyPalette platform and hosted the Balkans mixed-media exhibition in Albania.
Co-produced Ethereum Phoenix & AI Film 3 showcases in Arizona with Stand With Crypto partners.
Scaling gallery partnerships, brand commissions, and cross-country exhibitions for 55,000+ community members.
